name: Payroll Integration & Time Export
description: Payroll integration and time export functionality for accounting systems

prd.problem: Payroll data must be manually compiled from timesheets, PTO records, and salary information then entered into payroll systems, creating a time-consuming, error-prone process that delays payroll processing.
prd.solution: Create an export module that consolidates worker hours (from timesheets), PTO usage, salary/rate information, and generates files in standard payroll formats (CSV, IIF for QuickBooks, Excel) with field mapping configuration for different payroll providers.
successCriteria: Export payroll data for selected pay period
outOfScope: Direct API integration with payroll systems
risks: Data accuracy is critical for correct pay
Different payroll providers may need custom formats
